Class JasmParser

java.lang.Object
edu.westminsteru.jasm.parser.JasmParser
public class JasmParser extends Object
A parser for jasm code. This parser does not construct any sort of parse tree on its own; rather, an implementation of JasmParserListener is notified as elements of the code are parsed.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    JasmParser.State
    An enum describing the possible states the parser can be in.

  • Constructor Details

    • JasmParser

      public JasmParser(Reader in, JasmParserListener listener)
      Create a new JasmParser
      Parameters:
      in - the Reader to read from
      listener - the listener to notify of parsing events

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public void parse()
      Parses the input. Callbacks of the supplied JasmParserListener will be called as elements of the file are parsed.

    • abortParsing

      public void abortParsing()
      Aborts parsing the input. The listener may call this method if it wishes to discontinue parsing.

    • getState

      public JasmParser.State getState()
      Returns the current state the parser is in.
      Returns:
      the current state

    • getCurrentLine

      public String getCurrentLine()
      Returns the text of the current line being parsed (intended to be used by the listener).
      Returns:
      a String of the current line of text from the file

    • getCurrentLineNumber

      public int getCurrentLineNumber()
      Returns the number of the current line being parsed (intended to be used by the listener) — the first line of the file is line 1.
      Returns:
      the line number, counted from 1
